mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA(QNANUM, QNATITLE, QNACON, QNAWRITER, QNAPW, QNAANSWER, QNAFILE, QNAINSERTDATE, QNAUPDATEDATE, DELYN) VALUES(#{qnanum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnatitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnacon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnawriter, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnapw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnaanswer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qnafile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT A.QNANUM QNANUM ,A.QNATITLE QNATITLE ,A.QNACON QNACON ,A.QNAWRITER QNAWRITER ,A.QNAPW QNAPW ,A.QNAANSWER QNAANSWER ,A.QNAFILE QNAFILE ,QNAINSERTDATE QNAINSERTDATE ,QNAUPDATEDATE QNAUPDATEDATE ,A.DELYN DELYN FROM QNA WHERE A.DELYN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.QNANUM
